alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 9:25PM CDT until July 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in central Nebraska... Central Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 924 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Brewster, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewster, Dunning, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott and Hawley Flats. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 236 and 250. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
